briefdescription.para: Makes a "deep enough" copy of the object. Does not duplicate the bytes of the Data value.
Gets or sets the XML content of this Custom XML Data Storage Part.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is an empty byte array. The value cannot be null.

briefdescription.para: Specifies a cyclic redundancy check (CRC) checksum of the Data content.
Gets or sets the string that identifies this custom XML part within an OOXML document.

detaileddescription.para: ISO/IEC 29500 specifies that this value is a GUID, but old versions of Microsoft Word allowed any string here. Aspose.Words does the same for ECMA-376 format. But note, that Microsoft Word Online fails to open a document created with a non-GUID value. So, a GUID is preferred value for this property.
A valid value must be an identifier that is unique among all custom XML data parts in this document.
The default value is an empty string. The value cannot be null.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the set of XML schemas that are associated with this custom XML part.
Represents a Custom XML Data Storage Part (custom XML data within a package).

detaileddescription.para: A DOCX or DOC document can contain one or more Custom XML Data Storage parts. Aspose.Words preserves and allows to create and extract Custom XML Data via the CustomXmlParts collection.
